alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Spencer (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 1:02PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of central Spencer and central Shelby Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 100 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower with weak rotation near Taylorsville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This gusty shower will be near... Taylorsville around 105 PM EDT. Other locations in the path include Shelbyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This gusty shower may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
